verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sis-ters, brothers, we've got to learn to love each other.
Our Father in heaven has called us to be instruments of peace.
Children of His mer-cy, the time has come to face the sun and hold up high
The banner of love of the Lord until we gather in the sky.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
All God's children of love and light, every heart will be uni-fied,
Singing praise to the Lord our King on the day of the gathering,
On the day of the gathering.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Children of love and light:
We are the body of Christ, the kingdom come,
The hands and feet of His will be done; a torch in the dark of a dying place,
The living light of His saving grace, the living light of amazing grace.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Love and light, children of love and light,
Love and light, children of love and light,
Love and light.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sis-ters, brothers, we've got to learn to love each other.
Our Father in heaven has called us to be instruments of peace.
Je-sus is the Prince of Peace.
